properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_NAME, TO_CHAR(BIRTHDAY,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BIRTHDAY, GENDER, EMAIL, PHONE, ADDRESS, ENROLL_DATE, STATUS, PRIVILEGE, LOCATION_NAME FROM TB_MEMBER JOIN TB_LOCATION ON(LOCAL_CODE = LOCATION_CODE) WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT GENRE_NAME FROM TB_MEMBER JOIN TB_MEMBERGENRE ON(MEMBER_NO = MEM_NO) JOIN TB_GENRE USING(GENRE_CODE) WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER(MEMBER_NO,MEMBER_ID,MEMBER_PWD,MEMBER_NAME,BIRTHDAY,GENDER,EMAIL,PHONE,ADDRESS,LOCAL_CODE) VALUES (SEQ_MEMNO.NEXTVAL,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
INSERT INTO TB_MEMBERGENRE VALUES( SEQ_MEMNO.CURRVAL, (SELECT GENRE_CODE FROM TB_GENRE WHERE GENRE_NAME = ?))

SELECT TICKET_NO, PERSONNEL, MEMBER_NO, SCREEN_NO, SCREEN_NAME, MOVIE_TITLE, TO_CHAR(WATCH_DATE,'HH24:MI') || '~' || TO_CHAR(WATCH_DATE + NUMTODSINTERVAL(TO_NUMBER(MOVIE_RT), 'MINUTE'), 'HH24:MI') AS RT, THEATER_NAME, TO_CHAR(WATCH_DATE,'YY/MM/DD, HH24:MI') AS WATCH_DATE, TB_RESERVATION.STATUS AS STATUS, GRADE_1_COUNT, GRADE_2_COUNT, STUDENT_PRICE, COMMON_PRICE, TOTAL_PRICE, RESERVATION_DATE FROM TB_RESERVATION JOIN TB_SCREEN USING(SCREEN_NO) JOIN TB_MOVIE USING(MOVIE_NO) JOIN TB_THEATER USING(THEATER_NO) JOIN TB_ATTACHMENT USING(MOVIE_NO) JOIN (SELECT A.TICKET_NO, A.GRADE_1_COUNT, A.GRADE_2_COUNT, A.GRADE_1_COUNT * P1.PRICE AS STUDENT_PRICE, A.GRADE_2_COUNT * P2.PRICE AS COMMON_PRICE, (A.GRADE_1_COUNT * P1.PRICE) + (A.GRADE_2_COUNT * P2.PRICE) AS TOTAL_PRICE FROM (SELECT TICKET_NO, COUNT(CASE WHEN GRADE = 1 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS GRADE_1_COUNT, COUNT(CASE WHEN GRADE = 2 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS GRADE_2_COUNT FROM TB_RESERVATION JOIN TB_PRICESHEET USING(TICKET_NO) JOIN TB_PRICE USING(GRADE) WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? GROUP BY TICKET_NO) A JOIN TB_PRICE P1 ON P1.GRADE = 1 JOIN TB_PRICE P2 ON P2.GRADE = 2 ) USING(TICKET_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY TICKET_NO DESC
SELECT SEAT_NO FROM TB_SEAT WHERE TICKET_NO = ? ORDER BY SUBSTR(SEAT_NO, 1, 1), CAST(SUBSTR(SEAT_NO, 2) AS NUMBER), SEAT_NO
SELECT FILE_PATH, CHANGE_NAME FROM TB_RESERVATION JOIN TB_SCREEN USING(SCREEN_NO) JOIN TB_MOVIE USING(MOVIE_NO) JOIN TB_ATTACHMENT USING(MOVIE_NO) WHERE TICKET_NO = ?
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DATE FROM TB_BOARD WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT ANSWER_NO, BOARD_NO FROM TB_ANSWER WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT ORDER_NO, MEMBER_NO, STATUS, ORDER_DATE FROM TB_ORDER WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? ORDER BY ORDER_NO DESC
SELECT GOODS_NO, GOODS_NAME, GOODS_PRICE, QTY FROM TB_GOODS JOIN TB_ORDERDETAIL USING(GOODS_NO) WHERE ORDER_NO = ?
SELECT LOCATION_CODE FROM TB_LOCATION WHERE LOCATION_NAME = ?
UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET LOCAL_CODE = ?, ADDRESS = ?, EMAIL = ?, UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
DELETE FROM TB_MEMBERGENRE WHERE MEM_NO = ?
INSERT INTO TB_MEMBERGENRE VALUES(?,(SELECT GENRE_CODE FROM TB_GENRE WHERE GENRE_NAME = ?))
UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET MEMBER_PWD = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NAME = ? AND BIRTHDAY = TO_CHAR(?,'YYYYMMDD') AND PHONE = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
SELECT MEMBER_NO FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_NAME = ? AND BIRTHDAY = TO_CHAR(?,'YYYYMMDD') AND PHONE = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
UPDATE TB_RESERVATION SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE TICKET_NO = ?
